titleStmt.title: A sermon on the much lamented death of that reverend and worthy Servant of Christ Mr. Richard Adams, M.A. sometime fellow of Brazen-Nose Colledge in Oxford, afterwards, minister of St. Mildred Breadstreet, London, more lately, pastor of a congregation in SOuthwark, who deceased Febr. 7th, 1697/8 preached, February the 20th, 1698 / by John Howe.
titleStmt.author: Howe, John, 1630-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Bridge, for Tho. Parkhurst ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
